tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have consulted Nandhini Mam right from the early pregnancy scan and got a healthy baby delivered at Cloudnine Hospital (Old Airport Road) at 38 weeks.She is very soft-spoken and shows a lot of empathy. Her calm, composed, and patient behavior is something that differentiates her and gives a lot of confidence. Throughout the pregnancy journey, she provided all the support required. She patiently answered all our queries every single time during each and every visit. She also provided ad hoc/emergency support via WhatsApp messages, which gave us a lot of mental peace. She was very responsive throughout our pregnancy journey.Our pregnancy went very smooth all thanks to Nandhini Mam.I highly recommend Nandhini Mam to all the Moms/Dads-to-be, especially around the Indiranagar and Domlur area, as she is an excellent choice for someone seeking a highly professional doctor with the right level of support during pregnancy. She delivers at major maternity hospitals like CloudNine and MotherHood.Thank you so much for making our journey beautiful

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Since the day I got my positive pregnancy report we had been consulting doctor Nandini.very friendly doctor who listens to us with lot of patience .we undergone so many complications during my pregnancy but nevertheless doctor treated us with all the best she could and during delivery also she made me feel comfortable and I delivered a healthy boy baby through normal delivery that too at 37weeks I am really thankful to Nandini ma'am I would say my pregnancy was very smooth only because of you ma'am tons of thanks from my family side

****** ******** ** *** ** *** ****** ************* * **** **** *** ** ** ****,she's very punctual towards her work,She's a doctor who arrives at any time you want her,She's very kind,humble and cares for her patiences.
I like to share my personal experience with her to ull
When i got admitted in the hospital for delivery,i was very scared i told the doctor to do me C-Section,If others were in her place working in a big hospitals They would have done it but  she said she will do normal delivery and today i am blessed with a cute little princess ,Me and my kid both are healthy,M really very Thankful to God for getting me such a good doctor.
I will definitely refer my family and friends to Doctor Nandhini

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Highly Recommended Doctor in Halsuru, IndraNagar Area, We consulted the Doctor from the Early Pregnancy Stage itself, The Doctor Madam is very humble and Polite Nature,  she will clarify all your doubts with Patience.
   During some emergency time we are able to connect  the Doctor, even she is out of Station.

Thank you Doctor, 

Please continue your service to our Society.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
She has lots of patience and helped in clarifying all our doubts and answered to all our questions in detail. She has a good command on the subject and has answer to all our queries.

I strongly recommend her for any Gynaecology and Obstetrics related issues.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Nutrition for Pregnant Women,Pregnancy Tests,
review: *********** visited Dr. Nandini Ravindran for my pregnancy related check-up and consultations. She is very calm, explained everything very well. ,*************Will continue my pregnancy journey with Dr. Nadini Ravindran. **************Thank you so much ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Nandini is extremely friendly *** ********* ************** We have been visiting the clinic, since last 9 months.  She rightly guided on my wife's pregnancy journey and we religiously followed her advice. As a result, we have been blessed with a healthy baby through normal delivery. Again, thanks a ton to the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went casually to take confirmation of pregnancy but after taking consultation decided to continue my pregnancy journey with her.. Very cool and calm Dr who has patience to listen to problems unlike so called famous and best Doctors who will hardly talk to you after waiting for weeks of time for the appointment.. She makes you understand what's the problem and guides you well..would like to recommend women who wants to have nice and peaceful pregnancy journey...

* **** *** ********** **  *** **** ************* * **** ****** 
Was struggling with my UTI problems, and she treated me not only with the right medication but also she helped me to not to be dependable on only medicine, but can fix any health  issues with the right food and mindset,

She is very good listener *** **** **** ****** *I would higly recommended her,

context: Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,
review: The services that I receive from Dr. Nandhini Ravindran is excellent. She has been very attentive to my health issues. I have had complicated pregnancy problems and she has addressed them all. She is very kind and patient. I am very grateful for her. She explained everything to me in a very clear manner. She was also kind and friendly. All of the staff was great – they were helpful, patient and helped with my insurance. I had a great visit and the doctor’s demeanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommend this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went there after seeing the google reviews. I feel so great that i cud met Dr.Nandini. She was so patient and heard all problems so kind enough to explain things. I went to consult my mother even though my mom was not comfortable with the languages she listen carefully and patiently, all the neccesary tests were done and most importantly wat Drs lack these days are empathy. U are giving a service where empathy and patience matters a lot. She is one of that kind. I will recommend her to all. I wish if i knew before my delivery.And special mention to the reception staffs they were so supportive and nice.

Doctor was very precise and helpful with her approach and recommendations. 
Even the staff was very friendly and I could meet the doctor on time

Dr Nandhini is very experienced and talented. She listens your problems very patiently and responds to them calmly and assuringly. 
I will definitely recommend Dr Ravindran.

review: I had a bad reaction to Podowart medication prescribed by another doctor. I came to NR Clinic for a second opinion and I was very happy with the treatment I got. The doctor allayed my concerns and gave me the right treatment and advice to alleviate my issues.

review: I visited ma'am as I was getting irregular periods and also for complete sexual scan. She very clearly explained the issues and the test needed to assess the problem.  She makes the patient feel comfortable and keeps a normal follow up for their well being.
